incorrectly classifies.from sentence: The ARE model ( ) incorrectly classifies most instances of happy as neutral ( 43.51 % ) ; thus , it shows reduced accuracy ( 35.15 % ) in predicting the the happy class .

emotion classes.from sentence: Overall , most of the emotion classes are frequently confused with the neutral class .

TRE model.from sentence: Interestingly , the TRE model ( ) shows greater prediction gains in predicting the happy class when compared to the ARE model ( 35.15 % to 75. 73 % ) .

weaknesses.of: previous two models ( ARE and TRE )

benefits from.from sentence: The MDRE model ) compensates for the weaknesses of the previous two models ( ARE and TRE ) and benefits from their strengths to a surprising degree .

occurrence.from sentence: Furthermore , the occurrence of the incorrect " sad - to - happy " cases in the TRE model is reduced from 16 . 20 % to 9.15 % .
